content:
Hi @Brett Marquard

We are receiving the following error when validating scenario 3 Happy Kid for b1 sender:

The Comparing Notes Section corresponding to the code 11488-4 template id, Root Value = 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.65 and Extension Value = 2016-11-01 is not present in the submitted CCDA's

We can see the section with that LOINC code, template ID, and extension in our file so we are unsure what is triggering this error. Our note section also matches with a sample provided here: https://github.com/HL7/C-CDA-Examples/tree/master/Notes/Single%20Consultation%20Note
Has anyone else reported something similar?
Thanks,
Ozlem Kurt
did you post a copy of your sample to ETT mailing list? that is the spot ONC SITE team monitors
